name: Homemade Cookies (One Dozen)
description:
Price per dozen. Cookies are baked, beautifully packaged and shipped fresh. 

Choose one of these homemade varieties:

:Chocolate Chip (butter, shortening, sugar, vanilla extract, eggs, flour, salt, baking soda, semi-sweet chocolate chips)

:Peanut Butter (peanut butter, shortening, sugar, vanilla, eggs, milk, flour, salt, baking soda)

:Spicy Molasses (shortening, molasses, vanilla, eggs, sugar, spices, salt, baking soda, flour)

:Oatmeal (butter, shortening, eggs, vanilla, sugar, spices, salt, flour, old fashioned oats)
   
:Double Chocolate Coffee (butter, shortening, sugar, eggs, vanilla, coffee grounds, flour, salt, baking soda, semi-sweet chocolate)


other varieties may be available upon request. 

JUMBO (4 inch) cookies are also available at a cost of $4 for 6 cookies

name: Homemade Peanut Brittle
description:
Coating peanuts in sweet and crunchy candy makes it irresistible. This homemade peanut brittle has received rave reviews from all who have eaten it. Order this for your next party or just to keep a stash for yourself. You won't be sorry. 

Price is per pound.

name: Homemade Chocolate Covered Butter Toffee
description:
This is the most delicious butter toffee you have ever tasted, coated with chocolate and topped with sea salt (optional). Homemade with the finest ingredients.

Price is per pound.

(other topping options include almonds or other chopped nuts at an additional $2.00 per pound.)

name: Creamy Blue: Necklace & Earrings Set
description:
This lovely necklace and earrings set is hand beaded and perfect for every day wear. The earrings are fishhooks and the necklace is 26 inches in length. Show off your style with this eclectic collection of beads. 

(other designs available by request:
gold tone or silver wire and beads in black, purple, greens, blues, or neutrals.)
